subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees think the call-up Rico Noel, who was mentored by Dave Roberts, their 2004 playoffs nemesis, can be a dangerous pinch-runner and stolen base threat down the stretch.
snippet: The Yankees think the call-up Rico Noel, who was mentored by Dave Roberts, their 2004 playoffs nemesis, can be a dangerous pinch-runner and stolen base threat down the stretch.
